text: The Northern Cyprus Turkish Scouts () is a Scouting federation active in the de facto independent Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, and has strong ties to the Scouting and Guiding Federation of Turkey. ==References== *http://www.avrupagazete.com/avrupa.asp?Id=5209 *http://www.tif.org.tr/haberler/2006/mart/21/tif_pro.html ==External links== * Official website Category:Scouting and Guiding in Cyprus Category:Organisations based in Northern Cyprus
title: Scouts of Northern Cyprus
